title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 300.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 300.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) These regulations are
promulgated pursuant to the "New York Lemon Law," General Business Law ("GBL") section 198-a, as amended by chapter 799 of the Laws of 1986, and
section 198-b, as amended by chapter 609 of the Laws of 1989. They set forth the procedures for the operation of an alternative arbitration mechanism
(the "Programs") as required by GBL section 198-a(k) and GBL section 198-b(f)(3). (b) These regulations
are designed to promote the independent, speedy, efficient and fair disposition of disputes concerning defective new and used motor
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
300.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
